-e ---

𓋏 Ba’at Bat 𓆤

𓉞 Hathor <> Bat <> 𓉔 Balat B‘LT "The Semites writing these Alphabet texts (on a sphinx) appear to equate Hathor with their goddess, Ba‘alat."

𒂗 ⋍ 𒉺𒋼𒋛𒃻 Patesi ≈ puzur > pa'ria > 𒂗 Baal

𒁁𒉌 bar.ni > prince > be.eli baal bel

𒁁𒇻 be-lu < Baal < Ba'al < bassileo 𓆤
𒁁𒇻 come to an end, lord, proprietor, to be extinguished

𒁁𒂖 be-el "owner"

𒂖 𒊩⋅𒋛 mun⋅si ≈ sun & moon in 𒉿𒂖 "year" /piel/ /bel/ 𒁁𒌌 ⇔ Baal

𒁁𒇻 Baal < PIR in Napir nabu 𓎟 𓋞 ⇔ poly
𒁁𒇻 Baal < puzur 𒂗

lord ⇔ en 𒂗

𓆤 | king of Lower Egypt | ⲃⲁⲥⲓⲗⲉⲩⲥ ⋍ bee.lower/rex ⇔ Baal

𒁈 BÁRA preike(stuhl) 𒉺𒊩𒆠 pa-rak-ki preachers-throne-dais > Baal

𓈖 𓐍 𓃀 𓇑 𓏏 𓅐 | Nekhbet | •necro Balat / Banat
